title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database. Features include product filtering, cart management, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: A feature-rich chat application with real-time messaging using WebSocket, user authentication, group chat support, and emoji reactions. Built with React and Express.js.

title: Task Management Dashboard
description: A collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, team collaboration features, and progress tracking. Includes calendar and timeline views.

title: Machine Learning Model API
description: RESTful API for machine learning model inference with Python Flask backend, model serving, batch processing, and rate limiting. Includes comprehensive API documentation.

title: Social Media Feed
description: Instagram-like social media platform with feed algorithms, like/comment system, user profiles, image optimization, and notification system using React and Firebase.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Beautiful weather application with real-time data, 5-day forecast, interactive maps, location search, and weather alerts. Built with React and OpenWeather API integration.
